International Culture & Communications

In this world of increasing globalisation and internationalisation it is important for students to begin to understand the skills and knowledge that they will need to prepare themselves for the world of work. The module looks at areas such as national and organisational culture, communication, demographics etc. in the hope that it encourages the students to reflect on how they interact with others within the field of business.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Characterise the evolving theory of culture and concept of cultural distance.[Knowledge and Understanding]

+  Demonstrate an understanding of cultural distance and its implications for communication across national boundaries in International Business. [Learning, Analysis]

+  Critically evaluate the impact of globalisation on culture and its implications in future patterns of international business. [Learning]
